lessonPlanGenerator.name: Lesson Plan Generator
lessonPlanGenerator.description: Create comprehensive lesson plans with objectives, activities, and assessments tailored to your grade level and subject.

lessonHookIdeas.name: Lesson Hook Ideas
lessonHookIdeas.description: Generate creative and engaging opening activities to capture student attention at the start of your lesson.

iepGenerator.name: IEP Generator
iepGenerator.description: Create individualized education program goals and accommodations tailored to specific student needs.

learningObjectiveWriter.name: Learning Objective Writer
learningObjectiveWriter.description: Write clear, measurable learning objectives that align with standards and guide instruction.

presentationGenerator.name: Presentation Generator
presentationGenerator.description: Create engaging slide presentations with content, activities, and visual suggestions for your lessons.

academicContentGenerator.name: Academic Content Generator
academicContentGenerator.description: Generate curriculum-aligned content, explanations, and examples for any topic or subject area.

mathSpiralReview.name: Math Spiral Review
mathSpiralReview.description: Create math practice problems that review previously taught concepts alongside new material.

textValidation.name: Text Validation
textValidation.description: Check reading level, complexity, and appropriateness of texts for your target grade level.

multipleExplanationsGenerator.name: Multiple Explanations Generator
multipleExplanationsGenerator.description: Generate different ways to explain the same concept to help diverse learners understand.

generalAssessment.name: General Assessment
generalAssessment.description: Create comprehensive assessments including quizzes, tests, and performance tasks for any subject.

questionStemGenerator.name: Question Stem Generator
questionStemGenerator.description: Generate thought-provoking question stems to deepen student thinking and discussion.

worksheetGenerator.name: Worksheet Generator
worksheetGenerator.description: Create practice worksheets with problems, exercises, and activities for any subject area.

multiStepAssignmentCreator.name: Multi-Step Assignment Creator
multiStepAssignmentCreator.description: Design complex assignments that break down into manageable steps with clear instructions.

dokQuestionsGenerator.name: DOK Questions Generator
dokQuestionsGenerator.description: Create questions at different Depth of Knowledge levels to assess various thinking skills.

quizCreator.name: Quiz Creator
quizCreator.description: Generate quick formative assessment quizzes to check student understanding.

mathProblemGenerator.name: Math Problem Generator
mathProblemGenerator.description: Create custom math problems and word problems for practice or assessment.

aiTextDetector.name: AI Text Detector
aiTextDetector.description: Analyze student text submissions to identify potential AI-generated content and maintain academic integrity.

parentEmailComposer.name: Parent Email Composer
parentEmailComposer.description: Draft professional, warm emails to parents about student progress, concerns, or celebrations.

behaviorPlan.name: Behavior Plan
behaviorPlan.description: Create structured behavior intervention plans with clear strategies and measurable goals.

newsletterCreator.name: Newsletter Creator
newsletterCreator.description: Design engaging classroom or school newsletters to keep families informed and connected.

meetingAgenda.name: Meeting Agenda
meetingAgenda.description: Create organized agendas for parent conferences, team meetings, or IEP meetings.

progressReportComments.name: Progress Report Comments
progressReportComments.description: Generate personalized, constructive comments for report cards and progress reports.

studentRecommendationLetter.name: Student Recommendation Letter
studentRecommendationLetter.description: Write compelling recommendation letters highlighting student strengths and achievements.

bulletinBoardIdeas.name: Bulletin Board Ideas
bulletinBoardIdeas.description: Get creative ideas for seasonal, subject-specific, or motivational classroom bulletin boards.

classroomManagementPlan.name: Classroom Management Plan
classroomManagementPlan.description: Develop comprehensive classroom management strategies and procedures for smooth operations.

backToSchoolLetter.name: Back to School Letter
backToSchoolLetter.description: Create welcoming introduction letters to students and families at the start of the year.

groupingTool.name: Grouping Tool
groupingTool.description: Strategically group students for collaborative learning based on various criteria and goals.

absenteeWorkPlanner.name: Absentee Work Planner
absenteeWorkPlanner.description: Organize and plan make-up work and assignments for students who miss class time.

exitTicketGenerator.name: Exit Ticket Generator
exitTicketGenerator.description: Create quick formative assessment exit tickets to gauge student understanding before leaving.

readingComprehensionQuestions.name: Reading Comprehension Questions
readingComprehensionQuestions.description: Generate thoughtful questions to assess and improve student reading comprehension skills.

vocabListGenerator.name: Vocab List Generator
vocabListGenerator.description: Create targeted vocabulary lists with definitions, examples, and learning activities.

englishWritingPrompts.name: English Writing Prompts
englishWritingPrompts.description: Generate creative and analytical writing prompts to inspire student expression and critical thinking.

rhymingWordsGenerator.name: Rhyming Words Generator
rhymingWordsGenerator.description: Find rhyming words and create phonics activities to support early literacy development.

synonymAntonymGenerator.name: Synonym & Antonym Generator
synonymAntonymGenerator.description: Generate synonym and antonym pairs with engaging activities to expand student vocabulary.

mathWordProblems.name: Math Word Problems
mathWordProblems.description: Create real-world math word problems that connect mathematical concepts to everyday situations.

scienceLabDesigner.name: Science Lab Designer
scienceLabDesigner.description: Design hands-on science experiments and lab activities with safety considerations and clear procedures.

primarySourceAnalyzer.name: Primary Source Analyzer
primarySourceAnalyzer.description: Create analysis activities and questions for historical documents and primary sources.

currentEventsDiscussion.name: Current Events Discussion
currentEventsDiscussion.description: Generate age-appropriate discussion questions and activities based on current news and events.

culturalCelebrationPlanner.name: Cultural Celebration Planner
culturalCelebrationPlanner.description: Plan inclusive cultural celebrations and learning activities that honor diversity in your classroom.
